item.title: How To Get a Email Verified Badge
item.description: Email Certificates? Yes, these are certificate which verifies that you are using a certain type of encryption (S/MIME) when sending mails. This is rare because it’s not really necessary plus it’s a pain to set it up correctly. Getting Email Certificate Go to Actalis's website Enter the email you want to verify, click on “send verification email” and enter the OTP from the email. *Note: sometimes the email goes to the spam folder so make sure you check that as well
